verses.text: ‘I he taimi ko ia ‘e hoko ‘a e holi ‘o Sihova ko e matamatalelei‘anga mo e fakalāngilangi,
pea ko e fua ‘o e fonua ‘e hoko ko e pōlepole‘anga mo e teunga ki he toenga ‘o ‘Isileli.
Pea ‘e hoko ‘o pehē, ko e fakatoe ‘i Saione, ‘io, ko e toenga nofo Selusalema, ko e hingoa ‘e ui‘aki kinautolu ko e Ha‘a Mā‘oni‘oni, ‘a ia fua pē ‘i Selusalema kuo tohi ke hoko ki he kau mo‘ui.
‘Oka kuo fufulu ‘e ‘Ātonai ‘a e ma‘uma‘utunga ‘a e kau ta‘ahine Saione, mo tā ma‘a e toto‘ia ‘o Selusalema ke ‘osi mei ai, ‘aki ‘a e laumālie fakamaau mo e laumālie fakamomofi.

Pea ‘e fakatupu ‘e Sihova ‘i he funga nofo‘anga kotoa ‘o Mo‘unga Saione, pea ‘i he funga ‘o hono ngaahi fakataha, ha ‘ao, ‘aho, mo e kohu; pea po‘uli ko e huhulu ‘o ha afi ‘oku ulo: he ‘e fungani ‘aki ‘a e lāngilangi kotoa ha fakamalumalu.
Pea ‘e hoko ia ko e palepale ke fakamalumalu ‘aho mei he pupuha, pea ko e hūfanga mo e toitoi‘anga mei he taufa mo e ‘uha.
